description.en: Bitcoin with Variable Block Rewards (VBR) feature. Miners decide how much they want each block reward to be and then try and mine a block. The higher the block rewards, the harder it is to mine. This feature naturally turns into a "51% Attack Deterrent Algorithm".
description.de: Bitcoin with Variable Block Rewards (VBR) feature. Miners decide how much they want each block reward to be and then try and mine a block. The higher the block rewards, the harder it is to mine. This feature naturally turns into a "51% Attack Deterrent Algorithm".
